scholarships.title: 2022 NATIONAL SPACE CLUB & FOUNDATION KEYNOTE SCHOLARSHIP
scholarships.eligibility: Senior who will pursue a career in the STEM field and planning to attend an accredited U.S. college/university; current U. S. Citizen; completed application

scholarships.title: DELL SCHOLARSHIP
scholarships.eligibility: Senior in need; GPA 2.4 or higher; enrolled in a four-year accredited college or university
